links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (10,-45,120,-210,252,-210,120,-45,10,-1).
formula: Number of 14-subsequences of [ 1, n ] with just 5 contiguous pairs; g.f. 14*(4+5x)*x^3/(1-x)^10.a(n) = C(n+1, 4)*C(n+5, 5). - _Zerinvary Lajos_, May 26 2005, corrected by _R. J. Mathar_, Feb 10 2016
author: thi ngoc dinh (via _R. K. Guy_)
